column4: Hy! I want to lunch .exe file with wine but I cant becouse it says "The file '/home/Imker/Documents/LeagueofLegendsEUDownloader.exe' is not marked as executable.  If this was downloaded or copied form an untrusted source, it may be dangerous to run.  For more details, read about the executable bit."
what do you mean.. how can i start it?
in commandline type: sudo chmod 755 /home/Imker/Documents/LeagueofLegendsEUDownloader.exe Press ENTER and Type your admin/root password
